page.title: 05FISHING IN PIETHORNE VALLEY
page.content:
In{Piethorne valley}there is a reservoir called{Piethorne resrvoir. } Piethorne reservoir is a fly fishing reservoir.It has{Rainbow trout}in it. There is a club especially for fishing in Piethorne valley.Only the members of the club can fish in the reservoir.You can catch only{three {fish}at any one time.But if{one}of the fish is too small,or{two}of them are too small or{all}of them are too small for your satisfaction, you are not allowed to put them back.The{rain}that falls on the hills form{streams}and eventually will get into the reservoir.{Acid}would have mixed in with the water so the{treatment works} clean the water.The streams on the hills form part of the{Pennine chain.
K/B/5/6/85
